document.full_text: the new york times company reported that first-quarter net income dropped 57.6 percent, to $5.4 million, as print advertising remained depressed and about.com revenue fell.
document.title: profit down at times co., but web plan shows upside
lines_and_colors: the new york times company reported that first-quarter net income dropped 57.6 percent, to $5.4 million, as print advertising remained depressed and about.com revenue fell.
